website_summaries.verdict: Our pick if you want a large ring that will last through regular baking.
pros: Same product comes in sizes from 2.75 to 9 inches in diameter
Made from thick stainless steel that holds up well
Works well as a cutter and also can be used in the oven
cons: The largest available diameter is 9 inches, which might be smaller than you want
Depth varies, so check specs closely

customer_reviews.title: Great for layered cakes
customer_reviews.text: I used this ring mold to make a layered naked cake. I used this to cut out each layer and then as the bottom mold to keep it upright. This mold is a great size, completely round and a good thickness. I was worried if it wasn't sturdy enough that it might bend but it didn't. When it was time to push the cake through it slid right down with the help of the plastic paper shield that I had on there.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: this is exactly what i needed for cream filled cakes
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why people waste their time and energy trying to make a beautiful desert only to have it fall apart! without this ring many ice cream cakes and filled cakes have gone by the wayside!! This ring prevents all of this heartbreak. Just buy 2 slide them over the layers once in place and freeze until firm. then you can frost cake easily!
customer_reviews.author: barbara d.

customer_reviews.title: Not round, more of an oval
customer_reviews.text: When I got this ring, the first thing I noticed right away was that it was not round. It had a flattened side and it was unusable. It also had some minor scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: No Moving Parts
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, Thickness of the metal is such that the ring should hold its shape, with normal usage. Filler.
customer_reviews.author: Lemster

customer_reviews.title: love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find this 10X2 in cake ring since its such a hard size to find in stores. Although it was a little pricey. It works great and it came in great condition and since its stainless it resists warping.
customer_reviews.author: G. Navasca

customer_reviews.title: ... a handle to remove it from the hot grease like the professional ones do
customer_reviews.text: It needs to include a handle to remove it from the hot grease like the professional ones do. This is impossible to remove when its hot.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used this stainless steel ring to make a no bake cheesecake and it turned out to be perfect. The ring is nice and sturdy. It served the purpose very well so i highly recommend it. I'll update the review after using it for a baked cheesecake. Please hit the like button if you find the review helpful. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mayur Kudalkar

customer_reviews.title: Ever so slightly deformed (not a perfect circle, ) leading to non-level contact with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ever so slightly deformed (not a perfect circle,) leading to non-level contact with the baking surface, so not ideal for semi-liquid batters. The seam is more visible/rough than I'd like (imperfect release if you're using unlined mousses.) but good for tarts/quiches/simple layered cakes and entremets. A decent thickness of steel. Unlikely to deform further under normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Rigel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for funnel cakes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the rings for a funnel cake booth I was running at my church. I was a little nervous because there wasn't much said about using them for that. They are good quality and were perfectly round. I ended up not using them because I found them to be a little large for my purposes, and I couldn't fit more than one in the fryer. Next year I will be getting the 6" ones from this company though. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow - how sturdy, very good quality. I am buying other sizes FOR SURE. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice way to build a special cake for a special occasion
customer_reviews.author: Timesaflyin

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek stainless steel. I have washed these several times and they remain as shiny as when I first purchased them. Great choice for making layerd desserts, entremets and all sorts of goodies. This is coming from a pastry chef from Johnson & Wales University!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Sprenger

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - Poor Offcenter Welding
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I paid for something that should have been rejected at the factory. The ring is NOT aligned. The welding is visible and unsanitary looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 choice
customer_reviews.text: Compared with the one I bought before, this one is really of good quality and will not deform. After using it a few times before, all of them are not round. When making cakes, they cannot be cut very round. Buy it, it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia chen

product_meta.title: Fat Daddio's Round Cake & Pastry Ring Stainless Steel, 8 x 2 Inch, Silver
product_meta.description: Size:8 x 2 InchFat Daddio's Round Cake Rings are made from 18 gauge heavy-duty 18/8 stainless steel. The rings are welded and polished for a seamless feel. Excellent for baking, layering, and molding. Dishwasher safe. Lifetime .
feature_bullets: Welded and polished for a seamless feel
Excellent for baking, layering and molding

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars20 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
